alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jackson; Williamson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 2:52PM CDT until July 02 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Williamson County in southern Illinois... Northeastern Jackson County in southern Illinois... Western Franklin County in south central Illinois... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 252 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Hurst, or near Carterville, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Carbondale, Marion, Herrin, West Frankfort, Benton, Carterville, Johnston City, Christopher, Rend Lake Area, Zeigler, De Soto, Crainville, Cambria, Royalton, Energy, Elkville, Hurst, West City, Pittsburg and North City. This includes Interstate 57 in Illinois between Mile Markers 55 and 75. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
